Function reference

All functions

AIC(<poisGP>) BIC(<poisGP>) BIC(<poisGP>)
Akaike's Information Criterion and Bayesian Information Criterion for a Poisson-GP Object
MLE()
Maximum-Likelihood Estimation
MLE(<poisGP>)
Maximum-Likelihood Estimation of a Poisson-GP Model
RL()
Return Levels associated with Chosen Periods
RL(<poisGP>)
Return Levels and Confidence Intervals for a Poisson-GP Model
RP()
Return Periods associated with Chosen Return Levels or Quantiles
RP(<potData>)
Return Periods for a potData Object
as.potData()
Generic Coercion Function
as.potData(<Rendata>)
Coerce a Rendata Object
autolayer(<potData>)
Draw a ggplot Layer for a potData Object
autoplot(<RL.poisGP>)
Autoplot Method for Return Levels
autoplot(<RL.poisGPList>)
Autoplot Method for a List of Return Levels Tables
autoplot(<RLCheck.poisGP>)
Autoplot Method for RLCheck.poisGP Objects
autoplot(<confintCheck.poisGP>)
Autoplot Method for confintCheck.poisGP Objects
autoplot(<poisGP>)
Autoplot Method for poisGP Objects
autoplot(<potData>)
Build ggplot Graphics for a potData Object
coef(<poisGP>)
Extract Model Coefficients for a Poisson-GP Object
confint(<poisGP>)
Confidence Intervals for a poisGP Object
logLik(<poisGP>)
Log-Likelihood of a Poisson-GP Object
poisGP()
Create a Poisson-GP Model Object
potData()
Structured Data Used to Define a Poisson-GP Model
potomax-package potomax
Peaks Over Threshold and/or Block Maxima
print(<poisGP>)
Print Method for the Class "poisGP"
profLik()
Profile-Likelihood Inference Method
profLik(<default>)
Profile-Likelihood Inference for Fitted Parametric Model Objects
scale(<potData>)
Scale Method for the Class "potData"
threshData()
Select the Observations Over a Threshold within Heterogeneous Data provided as a potData object
vcov(<poisGP>)
Variance-Covariance Matrix for a Poisson-GP Object
